SEARCH
Module help
Package help.classes

Class Movie

java.lang.Object
help.classes.Movie
public class Movie extends Object
Represents a movie with details such as title, genre, release year, and duration.

  • Constructor Details

    • Movie

      public Movie(int id, String title, byte[] posterImage, String genre, String summary, String duration)
      Constructs a new Movie object with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the movie.
      title - The title of the movie.
      posterImage - The poster image of the movie as a byte array.
      genre - The genre of the movie.
      summary - A brief summary or description of the movie.
      duration - The duration of the movie in a suitable format (e.g., "120 min").

  • Method Details

    • convertToImage

      private javafx.scene.image.Image convertToImage(byte[] imageData)
      Converts a byte array representing image data into an Image object.
      Parameters:
      imageData - The byte array representing the image data.
      Returns:
      An Image object corresponding to the byte array, or null if the byte array is empty or null.
